title: Restoration of the current transformer secondary current under core saturation conditions based on ANN

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Ismoil Odinaev, Abdel-Haleem Abdel-Aty, Andrey Pazderin, Murodbek Safaraliev, Pavel Matrenin, Mihail Senyuk, Amir Abdel Menaem, Mohammad Kanan
